/** Colors */
/** Font variables */
/** Mixins */
.node--view-mode-full .component-teaser-grouping { margin: 0 0 1rem; }

.node--view-mode-full .component-teaser-grouping .component-teaser-grouping__content { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr; grid-gap: 2rem; }

@media (max-width: 991.98px) { .node--view-mode-full .component-teaser-grouping .component-teaser-grouping__content { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { .node--view-mode-full .component-teaser-grouping .component-teaser-grouping__content { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } }

.node--view-mode-full .component-teaser-grouping .component-teaser-grouping__content .component-embed-teaser, .node--view-mode-full .component-teaser-grouping .component-teaser-grouping__content .component-custom-teaser { margin: 0; width: auto; height: auto; }

.node--view-mode-full .component-teaser-grouping .component-teaser-grouping__content a { border-radius: 0; height: 100%; color: #FFFFFF; }

@media (min-width: 992px) { .node--view-mode-full .component-teaser-grouping { margin-bottom: 3rem; } }
